data.title: Prevent stroke thickness attribute from being negative.
ResourceCache wont work inside LogicComponent why?
data.body:
LogicComponent  guys, i have a problemas with Using ResourceCache inside LogicComponent, if i'm Using GetResource this is not working, not return ResourceCache.
Sorry for english

data.title: 2D Sounds without scene node
data.body:
Is it possibile to play 2D sounds without a scene dependency?
We are able to draw raw vertices on screen (bypassing the scene), but what about 2D sounds?

e.g. would be an environment with multiple scenes and a VoiceChat/Music stream (does not make sense to be tied to the scene).

data.title: compile on arm with opengles2
data.body:
Now almost all arm boards support opengl es2 with libs located in standard places (-lGLESv1_CM -lGLESv2)
except rpi - it have custom libs in /opt

cmake -DVIDEO_OPENGL=0 -DURHO3D_ANGELSCRIPT=0
need disable opengl because https://github.com/urho3d/Urho3D/blob/master/Source/ThirdParty/SDL/src/video/SDL_video.c#L48
and angelscript not compiles under arm

tested on odroid x2 (armv7)  and odroid c2 (aarch64)

Also RPI - strange flag, its just linux with arm arch and non standard libs path

Urho shared build
App cmake options include  -D CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS="-march=native" -D MINGW_SYSROOT="C:/mingw/x86_64-w64-mingw32" -D URHO3D_C++11=1

I'll try another mingw-w64 and keep poking around...

data.title: Add Http Request demo sample.
data.body: Commited just AngelScript version for now to avoid CI failure as require #1381 to be merged first. (Lua version have some issues with Deserializer API, I need to investigate because may be a bug in Urho3D/tolua++).

data.title: Add JSON method to deserialize from string and expose it to script interfaces.
GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_SEAMLESS issues
data.body:
OGLGraphics.cpp
https://github.com/urho3d/Urho3D/commit/3f861d67dd684d4ca9dbdbdcdbd6dfe9ec701407#diff-878294995c200c1ad22be2b31d26cdf5

There have been some problems with **GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_SEAMLESS** (OpenGL 3.2) on some older hardware; e.g., GeForce 9800 GT, 9600 GM -- these are OpenGL (correction: 3.2)

In some cases I have seen, the vertex shader aborts.

data.title: Enhanced text effects.
data.body: Adds drop shadow offset, stroke thickness and rounded stroke to be used in editor. Default stroke is the same as the previous 1 pixel stroke.

data.title: Window loses the ability to resize after double Alt+Enter
data.body:
An example of such problems is the editor. If you press the Alt+Enter, the program will go into full-screen mode. After pressing Alt+Enter program again will go to window mode. But the size of the window can no longer be changed.

Also I consider logical that the application should not change the current resolution when it goes into full screen mode, if it is WindowResizable. The window can take any size, it means it must adapts to the current resolution.

data.title: ScrollBar base class from UIElement to BorderImage
Update GLEW to 1.13.
data.body: Its time to update GLEW as 1.9 is from 2012.

data.title: What about real FBX support?
data.body: Would be nice to add official FBX sdk support for FBX, Collada and OBJ loading as it supports all of them.

data.title: iOS screen resolution error
data.body:
My device is iPhone 6 with iOS 9.3.

The game resolution is error as 480x320, thus the drawing part of the screen is smaller and we lost the sharpness of the retina screen.

And the correct resolution should be 1334 x 750. test by

``` objc
CGRect screenBounds = [[UIScreen mainScreen] bounds];
CGFloat screenScale = [[UIScreen mainScreen] scale];
CGSize screenSize = CGSizeMake(screenBounds.size.width * screenScale, screenBounds.size.height * screenScale);
```

**Is seems that this is a bug of SDL2 and the test programs from SDL2 are also incorrect.** 
and 

``` cpp
SDL_GetDesktopDisplayMode
```

cannot get the correct resolution.

data.title: Rework quad rendering
data.body: Quad command rendering in the View class currently sets identity model and view/projection matrices. This is different from deferred directional light rendering, which uses the proper projection matrix. Rework quad command to also work in the latter way, so that projection-related calculations work as expected, and furthermore set the command's shader parameters last so they can override engine's shader parameters.

data.title: Add import only animation
data.body:
simple import only animation option for the AssetImporter. 
added "Import Animation" menu item to the editor.
this works for my animations ...

data.title: Added EventProfiler
data.body:
hey this resolves #1360 
It is my first try for an event profiler. 
It uses the same logic as the profiler. 
It collects events from Object::SendEvent(StringHash eventType, VariantMap& eventData).

Event names are collected in a global HashMap see EventNameRegistrar in Object.h.
Should EventNameRegistrar be in a URHO3D_PROFILING block as well ? 

I dont like the activation and deactivation process, if possible i want just use RegisterSubsystem and  RemoveSubsystem for that. What do you think?

data.title: add anchorPoint to UIElement (feature request)
data.body: Currently Sprite has hotspot property to set the center of the sprite. But UIElement doesn't have this property. further hotspot is using actual size instead of percentage. Suggestion: add anchorPoint to UIElement, using percentage to set the center of this element. E.g., anchorPoint(0.5,0.5) will set the anchor point at the center of the element. That will make positioning UI more conveniently.

data.title: Engine does not send internal defines to custom "forwardlights" pass
data.body:
I want to render the weapon after blurring of scene:

RenderPath:

```
...
    <command type="quad" tag="MotionBlur" vs="MotionBlur" ps="MotionBlur" output="viewport">
        <texture unit="diffuse" name="viewport" />
        <texture unit="depth" name="depth" />
        <parameter name="ViewProjInv" value="0.0" />
        <parameter name="PrevViewProj" value="0.0" />
        <parameter name="Proj" value="0.0" />
        <parameter name="MyViewProj" value="0.0" />
        <parameter name="TimeStep" value="0.0" />
    </command>

    <command type="clear" depth="1.0" output="depth" />
    <command type="scenepass" pass="weaponbase" depthstencil="depth" />
    <command type="forwardlights" pass="weaponlight" depthstencil="depth"/>
```

but the brightness of the weapons varies discretely and there is no specular (It seems that it used vertex lighting)

![1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13021826/15342798/cf3e13f8-1ca0-11e6-9f9c-9a406b686c19.png)

when i add PERPIXEL and SPECULAR to materials

```
<technique vs="LitSolid" ps="LitSolid" psdefines="DIFFMAP">
    <pass name="weaponbase" />
    <pass name="weaponlight" psdefines="SPECMAP PERPIXEL" vsdefines="PERPIXEL" depthtest="equal" depthwrite="false" blend="add" />
</technique>
```

```
<technique vs="LitSolid" ps="LitSolid" psdefines="DIFFMAP">
    <pass name="weaponbase" vsdefines="ENVCUBEMAP" psdefines="ENVCUBEMAP" />
    <pass name="weaponlight" depthtest="equal" depthwrite="false" blend="add" vsdefines="PERPIXEL SPECULAR" psdefines="PERPIXEL SPECULAR" />
</technique>
```

it looks normally
![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13021826/15342875/3c6dd47c-1ca1-11e6-977e-43b263c9d9b4.png)

may be it used litbase, but 

```
<command type="forwardlights" pass="weaponlight" depthstencil="depth" uselitbase="false"/>
```

does not help me

EDIT: i have 3 light source outside the window and only one has specular (if this is important)

data.title: Overriding culling method for some passes (feature request)
data.body:
Currently culling method affected for all passes of material. Sometimes is needed to change the culling method for a single pass. For example drawing outline by scaling a model along the normals:
pass 1 - usual rendering of model
pass 2 - scale model along normal and render internal surface of model with enabled depth test

data.title: Disabling IRR causes undefined reference to `Assimp::IRRMeshImporter::IRRMeshImporter()'
data.body:
Setting ASSIMP_BUILD_IRR_IMPORTER to off causes Urho3D to not compile.

``` bash
[1/2] : && /usr/bin/c++   -Wno-invalid-offsetof -march=native -ffast-math -pthread -fdiagnostics-color=auto -O3 -DNDEBUG   Source/Tools/AssetImporter/CMakeFiles/AssetImporter.dir/AssetImporter.cpp.o  -o bin/tool/AssetImporter  -rdynamic lib/libUrho3D.a Source/ThirdParty/Assimp/libAssimp.a -ldl -lm -lrt -lGL lib/libUrho3D.a -ldl -lm -lrt -lGL && :
FAILED: : && /usr/bin/c++   -Wno-invalid-offsetof -march=native -ffast-math -pthread -fdiagnostics-color=auto -O3 -DNDEBUG   Source/Tools/AssetImporter/CMakeFiles/AssetImporter.dir/AssetImporter.cpp.o  -o bin/tool/AssetImporter  -rdynamic lib/libUrho3D.a Source/ThirdParty/Assimp/libAssimp.a -ldl -lm -lrt -lGL lib/libUrho3D.a -ldl -lm -lrt -lGL && :
Source/ThirdParty/Assimp/libAssimp.a(ImporterRegistry.cpp.o): In function `Assimp::GetImporterInstanceList(std::vector<Assimp::BaseImporter*, std::allocator<Assimp::BaseImporter*> >&)':
ImporterRegistry.cpp:(.text+0x4e0): undefined reference to `Assimp::IRRMeshImporter::IRRMeshImporter()'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
```

data.title: Audio 100% CPU load on linux
data.body: I'm using Urho3D 1.5. I have one program which does not play any audio. If I turn audio off it has 20% CPU load, if I enable audio it has >100% CPU load. Even if I reduce audio parameters to 11025 SoundMixRate (Stereo) no change. I know, it might be due to SDL2, but still annoying. Any ideas?
